org.javaavc.ffmpeg.avdevice

Interface Libavdevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.sun.jna.Library

    public interface Libavdevice
extends com.sun.jna.Library
    Special Devices Muxing/Demuxing Library. Libavdevice is a complementary library to Libavformat.
    Version:
    1.001
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)
